attributes.action: Support black businesses,with grant,investments and  opportunities around London
attributes.background: Am frm small community in Hackney it's not a holiday destination you would expect to go to but if you want a good time bet you you will find it there,reason for doing a petition is to see more black peoples starting their business with support from every ethnic groups to compete and prosper together

rejection.details: You could start a new petition asking clearly for a specific action from the UK Government or Parliament.
